plugin-definition.name: GPS-plugin
plugin-definition.description: The GPS plugin for SmartPM. It allows a to mark areas of interest from a real map (by selecting latidude/longitude values) and associate them to the discrete locations (e.g.,loc00, loc01,etc.) defined during the design stage

plugin-definition.name: Noize-plugin
plugin-definition.description: Noize plugin of SmartPM. It allows to associate the noise level catched with the microphone of a smartphone with discrete values defined at design-time.

plugin-definition.name: Arduino-plugin
plugin-definition.description: The Arduino Plugin allows to associate the real values gathered by external sensors attached to an Arduino platform with discrete values designed at design-time.
